analysis.description:
Reentrancy in InsightsNetwork3.importBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol#606-616):
	External calls:
	- amount = source.balanceOf(account) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol#613)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- imported (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol#613-614)
amount in InsightsNetwork2Base.lockedBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol#552-553) is a local variable never initialiazed

InsightsNetwork3.importBalanceOf has external calls inside a loop:
	- mintAmount = source.lockedBalances(account,index) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol)

InsightsNetwork3.importBalanceOf has external calls inside a loop:
	- unlockTime = source.unlockTimes(account,index) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol)

Reentrancy in InsightsNetwork3.importBalanceOf (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol#606-616):
	External calls:
	- amount = source.balanceOf(account) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol#613)
	- mintAmount = source.lockedBalances(account,index) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol)
	- unlockTime = source.unlockTimes(account,index) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol)
	- lockedBalances (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol)
	- totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol)
	- unlockTimes (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol)

InsightsNetwork1.register (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol#22-40) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- assert(bool)(unlockTime > currentTime) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4f4b9d39ee1bc63dfdc4304527fe14b42d6dc184.sol#36-37)
